name: FM Management
overview:
FM Management’s team obtained an international experience and is focused on the growth and development of small medium size companies.

They are committed to provide their clients with the necessary capital to support their strategic projects.

They are focused on long term competitiveness to provide their clients with long term growth program.

FM Management combined managerial with multifunctional skills, so that they could create dedicated and fit-to-the-purpose team with specific skills in strategic management or financials and control as well as marketing and sales or supply and logistics.

Furthermore they have an important background on turnaround, re-launch and restructuring projects

Therefore they mix their competences in order to optimize the definition and implementation of any operation or project.
